modio::Media.md - Grip

The Media object is contained by the modio::Mod object and lists links to videos, 3d models and images associated to a mod.

class Media
{
public:
  std::vector<std::string> youtube;
  std::vector<std::string> sketchfab;
  std::vector<Image> images;
};

API schema: Media Object

C compatible base object: ModioMedia

Name Type Description
youtube std::vector<std::string> Youtube links vector
sketchfab std::vector<std::string> Sketchfab links vector
images std::vector<Image> modio::Image object vector
